title: Learning to Kiss in the Snow
description: The Master of the Bizarre is back with his second collection of odd and disturbing tales. These tales will titillate. These tales will activate. These tales will renovate. But most importantly they will satiate your soul. Ranging from horror to dark comedy to action to science fiction to yes dear lord reader even erotica - Learning to Kiss in the Snow will grab you by the short and curlies and never let you go.- A man desperately in love must find a way to break his connection with his girlfriend before it kills him.- Getting the nymphomaniac of your dreams just might be more than you can handle.- A new fish tries to survive a night in the clink without getting raped... that is if the thing in the toilet doesn't get him first.All in all 17 new scintillating and salacious tales to sooth your battered and chapped brain. D.B.Tarpley is back and he has done it again! The pages have definitely been left bloody.
author: D.B. Tarpley
